CustomField.description: ** Conditionally Required System Calculated Override ** Link to the Price Rule that sets the "Sale Price" for the Subscription Line - automatically calculated from the linked Item's "Price Rules" if "Price Override" is unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Conditionally Required System Calculated Override ** Link to the Price Rule that sets the "Sale Price" for the Subscription Line - automatically calculated from the linked Item's "Price Rules" if "Price Override" is unchecked.
CustomField.label: Price Rule
